thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chengdu Qianfeng Electronics Applies To Withdraw Delisting Risk Warning After Returns To Black

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chengdu Qianfeng Electronics Applies To Withdraw Delisting Risk Warning After Returns To Black
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Chengdu Qianfeng Electronics Co :
* SAYS IT RETURNS TO NET PROFIT OF 7.7 MILLION YUAN ($1.23 million) IN 2017 VERSUS NET LOSS OF 33.4 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT APPLIES TO WITHDRAW DELISTING RISK WARNING AFTER IT RETURNED TO NET PROFIT IN 2017 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nQE5NF ; bit.ly/2ErpHWq Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2649 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
